user_agreement.1_1_text: This User Agreement (hereinafter referred to as the "Agreement") governs the relationship between the owner of the website stoptrip.com (hereinafter referred to as the "Site") and users who utilize the services and functionality of the Site.
user_agreement.1_2_text: The Site is owned by Oleg Sagaiakov.
user_agreement.1_3_text: Any use of the Site signifies the unconditional agreement of the user with the terms of this Agreement.
user_agreement.2_1_text: This Agreement regulates the rights and obligations of users who post information on the Site, as well as the rights and obligations of the Site owner regarding this information.
user_agreement.3_1_text: The user bears full responsibility for the information posted by them on the Site, including advertisement texts, images, and other materials.
user_agreement.3_2_text: The Site owner shall not be liable for the content, accuracy, and quality of the posted information, as well as for any losses or damages arising from the use or inability to use this information.
user_agreement.4_1_text: The user agrees not to post on the Site any information that violates the current legislation of the Russian Federation or the legislation of the country in which this information is posted.
user_agreement.4_2_text: The user agrees not to post on the Site any information that violates the rights of third parties, including copyright, trademark rights, and other intellectual property rights
user_agreement.4_3_text: The user agrees not to post on the Site any information containing malicious software or other materials capable of causing harm to the operation of the Site or its users.
user_agreement.5_1_text: All disputes and disagreements arising between the users of the Site or between the users and the Site owner shall be resolved through negotiations and cooperation.
user_agreement.5_2_text: In case it is impossible to reach an agreement through negotiations, disputes shall be resolved in accordance with the current legislation of the Russian Federation.
user_agreement.6_1_text: The Site owner reserves the right to make changes to this Agreement without prior notice to users.
user_agreement.6_2_text: Changes shall become effective from the moment they are published on the Site.
user_agreement.7_1_text: This Agreement is valid from the moment it is accepted by the user until its termination.
user_agreement.7_2_text: Acceptance of the terms of this Agreement implies the user's agreement with its provisions in full.
user_agreement.7_3_text: All matters not regulated by this Agreement shall be resolved in accordance with the current legislation of the Russian Federation.
user_agreement.7_4_text: This Agreement is drafted in Russian and English languages, and may be provided to the user in another language at the discretion of the Site owner.
user_agreement.7_5_text: In case of disagreement with the terms of this Agreement, the user undertakes to immediately cease using the Site.
user_agreement.8_1_text: The user voluntarily provides their personal data to the Site and agrees to their processing for the purpose of providing services and functionality of the Site.
user_agreement.8_2_text: Personal data of the user may include, but is not limited to, information such as name, contact information, email address, and other data provided by the user during the use of the Site.
user_agreement.8_3_text: Personal data of the user, including, but not limited to, phone number, email address, messenger identifiers, and other information, may be used to facilitate communication between users of the Site.
user_agreement.8_4_text: The Site owner undertakes to process the personal data of the user in accordance with the current legislation of the Russian Federation on the protection of personal data.
user_agreement.8_5_text: The user agrees that the Site owner may use the provided personal data to communicate with the user, as well as to improve the quality of services and functionality provided by the Site.
user_agreement.8_6_text: The Site owner undertakes not to disclose the personal data of the user to third parties without the user's consent, except as provided by the current legislation of the Russian Federation.
user_agreement.8_7_text: The user has the right to withdraw their consent to the processing of their personal data by sending a respective notification to the Site owner.
user_agreement.8_8_text: The user also has the right to access their personal data, request their correction, deletion, or blocking in case of inaccuracies or unlawful use.
user_agreement.8_9_text: In case of termination of using the Site, the user has the right to demand the deletion of their personal data from the Site's database.
user_agreement.8_10_text: The Site owner undertakes to take all necessary measures to protect the personal data of the user from unauthorized access, alteration, distribution, or destruction.
user_agreement.8_11_text: By confirming their agreement with the terms of this Agreement, the user also agrees with the Privacy Policy published on the Site.
user_agreement.final_text: The user confirms their agreement with the terms of this Agreement by using the Site and posting information on it.
